properties.query:
//Author: Stephen Rowley
//Description: Looks for Intune enrollments with unapproved platforms during the UEM pilot
//False Positives: None known
let approved_platforms = dynamic ([
    "Windows 10", "MacOS", "OSX", "iOS 14", "Android", "iOS 15"]);
let mainTimeFrame = 24h;
let identitylookupTimeFrame = 90d;
let main =
SigninLogs
| where TimeGenerated >=ago(mainTimeFrame)
| where AppDisplayName has "intune"
| where ConditionalAccessStatus !has "success"
| extend Detail = todynamic(DeviceDetail)
| extend detectedOs = parse_json(DeviceDetail).operatingSystem
| where not(detectedOs has_any(approved_platforms))
// | where ConditionalAccessPolicies['result'] == "failure" or ConditionalAccessPolicies['result'] == "success" or ConditionalAccessStatus == "notApplied"
| project
    Time = TimeGenerated,
    OS = Detail['operatingSystem'],
    Operation = OperationName,
    UserId,
    UserPrincipalName,
    ConditionalAccessStatus,
    AppDisplayName,
    CorrelationId,
    ConditionalAccessPolicies
;
let users = main
| summarize make_set(UserId)
;
main
| extend test = iif(ConditionalAccessPolicies == "[]", ConditionalAccessStatus, parse_json(ConditionalAccessPolicies[0].displayName))
| project-away ConditionalAccessPolicies
| join kind=leftouter (IdentityInfo
| where TimeGenerated >=ago(identitylookupTimeFrame)
| where AccountObjectId in (users)
| summarize max(TimeGenerated), make_set(AccountDisplayName), make_set(AccountUPN), make_set(Department), make_set(JobTitle) by AccountObjectId
| extend AccountDisplayName = set_AccountDisplayName[0], AccountUPN = set_AccountUPN[0], Department = set_Department[0], JobTitle = set_JobTitle[0]
| project-away set_JobTitle, set_Department, set_AccountUPN, set_AccountDisplayName, max_TimeGenerated
| extend JobTitle = iif(AccountUPN contains "dod365.onmicrosoft", "Admin Account", iif(isempty(JobTitle), "Not Listed", JobTitle ))
| extend Department = iif(AccountUPN contains "dod365.onmicrosoft", "Admin Account", iif(isempty(Department), "Not Listed", Department))
) on $left.UserId == $right.AccountObjectId
| project-away UserPrincipalName
properties.description:
Looks for Intune enrollments with unapproved platforms during the UEM pilot
PLATFORM:Microsoft 365,Windows,IaaS
MITRE:T00001;T1199;T1200
